SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

edu.cmu.cs.plural.annot
Annotation Type ClassStates

@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface ClassStates

A prototype of state invariants, this class allows you to declare a set of mutually exclusive states, and the invariants that they imply (if any) on fields of the class they describe. I know that at some point I am going to have to integrate this with KB's States considering it does the declaration part of this annotation, and that's actually what I wanted to call my annotation.

Since:
Feb 22, 2008
Author:
Nels Beckman

Optional Element Summary
 State[] value
          The list of all state definitions.
 

value

public abstract State[] value
The list of all state definitions. The default is none.

Default:
{}
